title: #222 - Onora O'Neil And Trust
itunes:title: #222 - Onora O'Neil And Trust
description: Hope you're ready for the audio version of trust fall because this week Connor and Dan are discussing the philosopher Onora O'Neil and her thoughts on humanities relationship with trust. Unfortunately, it's up to these two podcast hosts to determine what news sources are competent, reliable, and honest. God help us, they're going to try their best.
